title: The Valentine
description: Lady Madeline Ryder wants an exciting life with a handsome, enticing Pirate King. Her aunt and her father, however, have very different plans for her. They have given her until Valentineâ€™s Day to become engaged to their idea of the perfect man. Madeline is resigned to meekly do as she is told, until a chance meeting on the street has her stumbling into the arms of Lord Samuel Powell, Duke of Wiltshire. One look in his mischievous, twinkling blue eyes and Madeline is ready to fight for what she wants, true love. Now Madeline has two weeks to convince her family that Sam is her perfect Valentine, despite his past, and that love will always conquer all.
author: Elizabeth A. Lance
